__e: Cap, this for real, or are you yanking my chain here?
Please tell me there was a good reason for that because I have always wanted to meet Cap and knocking a guy out is not a way to meet your hero.
What I wanna say, Cap', is that I'm hoping you and I can... start over.
It's a miracle Cap wasn't killed too.
But, Cap, I'm still not sure why you called me in.
Cap didn't get the chief job, and it's all my fault.
